B

backToMain() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.controller.GameEndMenuController
Switches to the main menu when the back to main button clicked.
backToMain() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.controller.GuidanceController
Switches to the main menu when the back button clicked.
backToMain() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.controller.PauseMenuController
Switches to the main menu when the back to main button clicked.

Switches to the main menu when the back button clicked.
backToMain() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.controller.RankingListController
Switches to the main menu when the back to main button clicked.
Ball - Class in com.ning.breakout.view.graphics
Ball is the abstract base class for all ball classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all ball classes.
Ball(BallModel, Group) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Ball
The class constructor sets the model of the ball, binds the layout of the view of the ball with the model and adds the view to the container.
BallModel - Class in com.ning.breakout.model
Model class of the ball, which defines the attributes (radius, position of five feature points) of the ball and provides methods to access/modify these attributes.
BallModel(Point2D, int) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.model.BallModel
The class constructor specifies the radius and the position of five feature points of the ball.
Brick - Class in com.ning.breakout.view.graphics
Brick is the abstract base class for all brick classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all brick classes.
Brick(BrickModel, int, Group) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Brick
The class constructor sets the model and the view container of the brick, binds the layout of the view of the brick with the model, adds the view to the container, and specifies the number of effective impacts that the brick can withstand in total.
BrickFactory - Class in com.ning.breakout.view
BrickFactory is the class which takes the responsibility of making bricks for all levels of the game.
BrickFactory(Group, int, int, double) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.BrickFactory
The class constructor sets the container of the view of the bricks produced in the brick factory, the number of bricks and the number of brick lines (rows) in a level, and the ratio of the width and height of the produced bricks.
BrickModel - Class in com.ning.breakout.model
Model class of the brick, which defines the attributes (width, height and the position of the left-top point) of the brick and provides methods to access/modify these attributes.
BrickModel(Point2D, int, int) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.model.BrickModel
The class constructor specifies the width and the height of the brick, as well as the position of the left-top point of the brick.
